question: A ceiling fan is rotating around a fixed axle as shown. The direction of angular velocity along
images/a9b0c1d2-e3f4-4a5b-6c7d-8e9f0a1b2c3d.png
explanation: Based on the arrow in the diagram indicating the direction of rotation (likely Clockwise when viewed from top), the angular velocity vector points downwards along the negative z-axis ($-\hat{k}$) according to the right-hand rule.
